column2: plot(xb09, out$soc, col = cbPalette[1], xlim = c(100,315), ylim=c(62,70), cex = sp, lty = 1, cex.axis = sa, pch = 16, ylab=expression("Pools (mgC" ~ cm^{-3} ~ ")"), xlab="Day of Year", main="SOC", cex.lab = sa)
